segments.text: I see the woman drying a plate, completely lost in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out of the sink, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for cookies, and the stool looks like it’s about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everything looks outside compared to this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is going to slip on that wet floor any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is taking all the risks, and the girl is just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
